Regards,

urls.title: Apply for Ethiopian eVISA Online | Ethiopian E Visa Official Website
urls.description: Ethiopian e-Visa | Apply for Ethiopian e-Visa online and secure your Visa now. Ethiopian e-Visa official website , Learn how to apply for different types of immigrant visas for tourists, students, business travelers and Other Visas. Get your Visa and visit the Land of Origins - Ethiopia. Also, find information about Visa Programs, and how to work in Ethiopia as a foreign worker.

data.text:
Ever considered setting foot in Land of Origins? Visit Ethiopia, the #LandOfOrigins. Apply for your visa online:  https://t.co/EA2oHVHvJP
